javax.constraints.impl.constraint

Class ConstraintMax

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.constraints.impl.CommonBase
      • javax.constraints.impl.AbstractConstraint
        • javax.constraints.impl.constraint.ConstraintMax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint

    public class ConstraintMax
extends AbstractConstraint
    This is a linear constraints for a constrained integer variable that is equal to the maximal variable in the array "vars" when they are all instantiated.
